select b.* from ( select a.*, row_number() over (order by VCT_REG_DT desc) rnum from ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT va.VCT_APLY_CD, EMP_ID, VCT_RSN, TO_CHAR(VCT_BGNG_DT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_BGNG_DT, TO_CHAR(VCT_END_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_END_DT, VCT_USE_DAY_CNT, TO_CHAR(VCT_REG_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_REG_DT, VCT_REG_USER, TO_CHAR( VCT_MDFCN_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_MDFCN_DT, VCT_MDFCN_USER, VCT_APLY_APR_STTS, VCT_APLY_APR_REASON, TO_CHAR(VCT_APLY_APR_YMD,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_APLY_APR_YMD FROM VACATION_APPLY va LEFT OUTER JOIN VACATION_APPLY_APPROVAL vaa ON va.VCT_APLY_CD = vaa.VCT_APLY_CD WHERE VCT_APLY_APR_ID = #{empId}) g LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT y.Emp_ID, y.emp_NM, y.DEPT_NM, jbgd.JBGD_NM , y.TEAM_NM FROM (SELECT z.Emp_ID, z.emp_NM, z.DEPT_NM, z.jbgd_cd, team.TEAM_NM FROM (SELECT emp.Emp_ID, emp.emp_nM, emp.team_cd, emp.jbgd_cd, dept.DEPT_NM FROM (SELECT EMP_ID, emp_nM, DEPT_CD, TEAM_CD, JBGD_CD FROM EMPLOYEE ) emp LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT dept ON emp.dept_cd = DEPT.DEPT_CD ) z LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM team ON z.team_cd = team.TEAM_CD) y LEFT OUTER JOIN JOBGRADE jbgd ON y.jbgd_cd = jbgd.JBGD_CD )h ON g.emp_id = h.emp_id ) a ) b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT va.VCT_APLY_CD, EMP_ID, VCT_RSN, TO_CHAR(VCT_BGNG_DT, 'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_BGNG_DT, TO_CHAR(VCT_END_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_END_DT, VCT_USE_DAY_CNT, TO_CHAR(VCT_REG_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_REG_DT, VCT_REG_USER, TO_CHAR( VCT_MDFCN_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_MDFCN_DT, VCT_MDFCN_USER, VCT_APLY_APR_STTS, VCT_APLY_APR_REASON, TO_CHAR(VCT_APLY_APR_YMD,'yyyy-MM-dd') VCT_APLY_APR_YMD FROM VACATION_APPLY va LEFT OUTER JOIN VACATION_APPLY_APPROVAL vaa ON va.VCT_APLY_CD = vaa.VCT_APLY_CD WHERE va.VCT_APLY_CD = #{vctAplyCd}) g LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT y.Emp_ID, y.emp_NM, y.DEPT_NM, jbgd.JBGD_NM , y.TEAM_NM FROM (SELECT z.Emp_ID, z.emp_NM, z.DEPT_NM, z.jbgd_cd, team.TEAM_NM FROM (SELECT emp.Emp_ID, emp.emp_nM, emp.team_cd, emp.jbgd_cd, dept.DEPT_NM FROM (SELECT EMP_ID, emp_nM, DEPT_CD, TEAM_CD, JBGD_CD FROM EMPLOYEE ) emp LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT dept ON emp.dept_cd = DEPT.DEPT_CD ) z LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM team ON z.team_cd = team.TEAM_CD) y LEFT OUTER JOIN JOBGRADE jbgd ON y.jbgd_cd = jbgd.JBGD_CD )h ON g.emp_id = h.emp_id
